title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Search for references to this field5.
OB: When searching for references to the 'tmpFir' field in the 'java.io.File' class, the search results are not being selected in the external jar. The search operation completes successfully, but the results are not highlighted or selected in the search view.
EB: You should get 3 matches in the method 'getTempDir()' when searching for references to the 'tmpFir' field in the 'java.io.File' class. The search results should be highlighted or selected in the search view for easy navigation and analysis.
SR:
To reproduce the issue and verify the bug: 
1. Make sure you have JDK 1.3.1 set as the default JRE in your IDE.
2. Ensure that you have the source for 'rt.jar' in your IDE.
3. Open the 'java.io.File' class in the editor.
4. Perform a search for references to the 'tmpFir' field.
5. Check the search results in the search view and verify if they are being selected or highlighted as expected.
